text: ELISA is appropriate as a screening tool , as it is 10 - fold more sensitive than IFA . However , it may cross - react with seasonal human coronavirus antibodies , so a spike protein - specific IFA is required for confirmation . PRNT is a definitive test when ELISA and IFA have inconclusive results [ 25 ] . Only 10 % of ELISA - positive results are positive on a neutralization assay [ 25 ] . In our study , 1 of 7 patients with borderline or positive ELISA results also had positive results in PRNT . Therefore , the results obtained in our study are accurate because ELISA , IFA , and PRNT were used .
